question: I came to know tha we are not allowed to do teeth fillings (Balack or White) can you please get me a hadith on this. Also if we have already put fillings shoud we remove it?
answer:
QUESTION

I came to know tha we are not allowed to do teeth fillings (Balack or White) can you please get me a hadith on this. Also if we have already put fillings shoud we remove it?

Dose Black fillings has bad effect on ones health?

 

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

It is permissible to have one’s teeth filled for medical reasons. There is no hadith prohibiting this.

You may consult a dentist on regarding the effect of black fillings on one’s health.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Ml. Ehzaz Ajmeri,
Student Darul Iftaa
